Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Posredujemo u prodaji kuće za odmor u Poličniku, samo 15 kilometara od grada Zadra. Novoizgrađena vila je smještena u mirnom predjelu, savršenom mjestu za bijeg od svakodnevnih obaveza i užurbanosti gradskog života. Kuća ima pet prostranih i udobnih spavaćih soba, četiri kupaonice, te na svakom katu po jednu kuhinju, blagovaonicu i dnevni dio. Nadalje, ima saunu i prostoriju za igru te privatni parking. Okružena je prekrasno uređenim vrtom i okućnicom, sa roštiljem i bazenom površine 60m2, te sunčalištem. Površina vile iznosi 200m2, a nalazi se na 2000m2 velikom terenu. Ova nekretnina je idealna za odmor u idilično mirnom okruženju i prirodi, u blizini mora i ostalih sadržaja. Prednost je koncept dviju odvojivih stambenih jedinica, te pruža jos više mogućnosti za rentabilnost nekretnine. Za dodatne informacije molimo nazovite +385 99 4000 602, Katja. Kupac plaća agencijsku proviziju. Razgled nekretnine moguć je isključivo uz potpisani Ugovor o posredovanju, u skladu sa Zakonom o zaštiti podataka i Zakonom o posredovanju i prometu nekretninama. We mediate in the sale of a holiday home in Poličnik, only 15 kilometers from the city of Zadar. The newly built villa is located in a quiet area, the perfect place to escape from everyday duties and the hustle and bustle of city life. The house has five spacious and comfortable bedrooms, four bathrooms, and a kitchen, dining room and living room on each floor. Furthermore, it has a sauna and a game room, as well as a private parking lot. It is surrounded by a beautifully landscaped garden and garden, with a barbecue and a swimming pool of 60 m2, and a sunbathing area. The area of ​​the villa is 200m2, and it is located on a 2000m2 plot. This property is ideal for a holiday in an idyllically peaceful environment and nature, close to the sea and other facilities.  The advantage is the concept of two separable residential units, which provides even more opportunities for real estate profitability. For additional information, please call +385 99 4000 602, Katja. The buyer pays the agency commission. Viewing the property is only possible with a signed Brokerage Agreement, in accordance with the Data Protection Act and the Act on Brokerage and Real Estate Transactions.
